TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeLibVarAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Contains the that were originally imported for this field from the COM type library.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) applies this attribute to fields.
This attribute is applied when a type library is imported and should never be changed. It is only applied when the method's `VARFLAGS` evaluate to non-zero. The attribute is designed to be used by tools that need to know how the original `VARFLAGS` were set. The common language runtime does not use this attribute.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to get the TypeLibVarAttribute value of a field.
[!code-cpp[TypeLibVar#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.runtime.interop_3_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[TypeLibVar#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.interop_3_1.cs)] [!code-vb[TypeLibVar#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.interop_3_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int16 flags) cil managed

Docs.param: The value for the attributed field as found in the type library it was imported from.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibVarFlags flags) cil managed

Docs.param: The value for the attributed field as found in the type library it was imported from.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.
Gets the value for this field.
